body_html:
Thanks for pointing that out @snnn.

@oahzuw If you really want to build and train models, you'll have a much easier time learning python and doing it there. The java API operates at a much lower level, enough to run an existing model, but you wouldn't want to work in it directly.

It looks like there's already a link to that LabelImage.java example on the install/install_java page. Does anyone have other suggestions on how to make it easier to find?
